channel.title: [BUG] Party System not working
channel.description:
#### What happened? When inviting a friend to a party it simply would not give the invite to the recipient.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Upon inviting said friend to a party they should have gotten a invite to join me, where they can accept or decline.
#### Steps to reproduce: 1. Invite friend to party from Title Screen.
#### Comments: Edit: If you do the following; 1. Create Party 2. Invite Friend
It should work properly.

item.title: [BUG] Party System not working
item.dc:creator: mathmods
item.description:
Well, me and my friend messed around with it and came to the conclusion that:

  1. If you directly invite someone from title screen, it will end up as the described outcome above
  2. If you create a party, THEN invite someone, it should invite properly.

Read full topic

item.title: [BUG] Party System not working
item.dc:creator: lebh
item.description:
This started maybe a week ago, and also affects inviting other and getting invites.
but I am also on Linux, and I have the same issues as @ofLegends where this affects me all the time,
after a new game has started and while I have been playing for 3-4 hours still the same.

Read full topic

item.title: [BUG] Party System not working
item.dc:creator: ofLegends
item.description:
This is happening to me every single time, doesn’t matter if it’s after playing a game or when I just launch the game. It’s not rare for me at all.

Player.log (64.5 KB)
^ linux logs

Read full topic

item.title: [BUG] Party System not working
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
I can confirm that it is a bug, I met in somedays ago…

But it only happens rarely as it seems…

Read full topic

item.title: [BUG] Party System not working
item.dc:creator: mathmods
item.description:
What happened?

When inviting a friend to a party it simply would not give the invite to the recipient.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Upon inviting said friend to a party they should have gotten a invite to join me, where they can accept or decline.

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Invite friend to party from Title Screen.

Comments:

Edit: If you do the following;

  1. Create Party
  2. Invite Friend

It should work properly.

Read full topic
